title: Navigate to the first unchecked radio button in a group in reading mode
task: Navigate to the first unchecked radio button in a group
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the radio group, and hides the group heading
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Regular crust' radio button.
assertion2: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
assertion4: Name of the radio button, 'Regular crust', is conveyed
assertion5: State of the radio button, 'unchecked', is conveyed
assertion6: 2:Position of the radio button, 1, is conveyed
assertion7: 2:Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
